name: VOICE FOUNDATION

address: No: 42 Mcnichols Avenue, Flat No:A1,Ashok Nandhaki,Chetpet,

briefDescription: To promote and support child - centred community development programs with the following main objectives:1.	EDUCATION: Promotion of Pre-Schooling, Promotion of Quality Education, Inclusive Education and Youth Engagement and related educational activities. 2.	HEALTH AND NUTRITION: To improve health status of children by reducing malnourishment. Maternal and Child health care programs, Nutritional well-being and allied health activities.  3.	SUSTAINABLE LIVELIHOODS DEVELOPMENT:  To increase income of the families by diversification of capital to reduce poverty levels among the poorest of poor.  4.
